summary: Two Ex-Pat Kindergarten teachers in Taiwan embark on a quixotic odyssey to bury a fellow countryman.
cast: Billy Harvey|Jeff Palmiotti|Leonora Lim-Moore|Erin King|Fu-Kuei Huang|Chia-Ying Kuo|Joseph Shu|Sean Scanlan|Will Mounger|Jimi Moe|Hai-sen Ni|Eva Liao|Michael Jian|Catherine Li|Magnus von Platen|Bob Bloodworth|Zi-Ning Chou|Bin-he Feng|Jore Liu|Che-Lun Ou|Dean Sung|Wei-Jyun Tao|Klairinette Wu
title: The Taiwan Oyster
